Hash Subject
0c2d382 chore(deps): pin ghcr.io/projectbluefin/common docker tag to 948d006 (#858)

65dc937 revert: remove merge_group as reason to build (#857)
44f1fa2 fix: remove merge_group as reason to build (#853)
b5b86b5 feat: switch GDX builds to official NVIDIA repository with ARM64 support (#814)
6b964ab chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v6 (#849)
a1ee062 fix: Restore SELinux contexts for tuned directories. (#851)
b83d260 feat(firewalld): configuration to open unprivileged ports by default (#719)
4dc863a feat: change release workflow from push-based to weekly schedule (#848)
6a645ec chore(deps): update quay.io/centos-bootc/centos-bootc:c10s docker digest to 01f66a0 (#850)
45758cf docs: update documentation links and attribution guidelines (#847)

How to rebase

For current users, type the following to rebase to this version:

# Get Image Name
IMAGE_NAME=$(jq -r '.["image-name"]' < /usr/share/ublue-os/image-info.json)

# For this Stream
sudo bootc switch --enforce-container-sigpolicy ghcr.io/ublue-os/$IMAGE_NAME:lts

# For this Specific Image:
sudo bootc switch --enforce-container-sigpolicy ghcr.io/ublue-os/$IMAGE_NAME:lts.20251125

How to rebase

For current users, type the following to rebase to this version:

# Get Image Name

# For this Stream
sudo bootc switch --enforce-container-sigpolicy ghcr.io/ublue-os/$IMAGE_NAME:lts

sudo bootc switch --enforce-container-sigpolicy ghcr.io/ublue-os/$IMAGE_NAME:lts.20251027
